column5: Just wondering if anyone out there has a schematic drawing of the bottom end of this motor. It has to come off and any help would be appreciated. If anyone has a drawing you could send by E-mail that would be a real plus. Thanks.:+
JerryGO to this website you will see a break down and parts listing of all Mercury motors, you will like it. www.mercruiserparts.com It says Mercuriser but the outboards are on it also.
